Gabriele Marra

Milan, Italy · +39 3462472295 · info@gabrielemarra.tech

As a Junior Software Engineer specializing in space cybersecurity, my passion for technology extends to space exploration, underpinned by my interests in science, music, and sports. My journey has led me from academic research to practical, real-world applications, giving me a diverse skill set. My most notable achievements include leading satellite software development for a CubeSat mission and overseeing security for an open-source satellite OS project.

With a Master's degree in Computer Engineering and experience as a freelancer, I am driven to make a meaningful impact in a company or research center that shares my enthusiasm for pushing the boundaries of technology.

Experience

Space Cybersecurity Researcher

CISPA - Helmholtz Centre for Information Security

Overseeing security for RACCOON OS, a new open-source satellite OS project in collaboration with leading universities. Responsible for designing and implementing application isolation solutions within the OS while ensuring high reliability and minimal performance overhead.
